channel.title: People on Markus Eliasson
channel.description: Recent content in People on Markus Eliasson

item.title: Bytes do not destroy software — people do
item.description: Most of the times, people seem to refer to organic growth — much like a garden that grows wild when there’s no-one that’s maintaining it. This is not a valid metaphor — biological growth happens thanks to photosynthesis and is not by the hand of man. Software on the other side is static — it does not change by itself — it changes when someone change it or change the environment it operates in.
